reference.title: cxxUnionDefinition
reference.shortdesc: Contains child elements giving further information about a C++ union.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxUnionDefinition> element is defined within <cxxUnionDetail>. The child element <cxxUnionAPIItemLocation> is mandatory. The <cxxUnionAccessSpecifier> child element can be used to indicate the access modifier applied to the members of the union.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxUnionDefinition> <cxxUnionAccessSpecifier value="public"/> <cxxUnionAPIItemLocation> <cxxUnionDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="C:/src/include/e32base.h"/> <cxxUnionDeclarationFileLineStart name="lineNumber" value="2784"/> <cxxUnionDeclarationFileLineEnd name="lineNumber" value="2854"/> </cxxUnionAPIItemLocation> </cxxUnionDefinition>
